dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2539 IS: Chairman James Mountain Inhofe Recognition Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Rounds (for himself and Mr. King) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To redesignate the Department of Defense Africa Center for Strategic Studies as the James M. Inhofe Africa Center for Strategic Studies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chairman James Mountain Inhofe Recognition Act of 2025.

section.header: Redesignation of Africa Center for Strategic Studies as James M. Inhofe Africa Center for Strategic Studies

subsection.header: Reference to regional centers for strategic studies
subsection.text: Section 342(b)(2)(D) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking Africa Center for Strategic Studies and inserting James M. Inhofe Africa Center for Strategic Studies.

Any reference to the Department of Defense Africa Center for Strategic Studies in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States shall be deemed to be a reference to the James M. Inhofe Africa Center for Strategic Studies.
